price: 82.  Il n’a d’autre commandement, quand Il veut une chose, que de lui dire : « Sois ! » et elle est.
arabic: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innamā amruhu idhā arāda shayan an yaqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
